meanings.sent1: She was nudging the door open with her elbow.
meanings.sent2: He was nudging his friend to get his attention.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept nudging the ball around the room.
meanings.sent4: The sun was nudging its way through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The wind was nudging the leaves off the tree gently.

meanings.sent1: With a small nudge, the book fell off the shelf.
meanings.sent2: She felt a nudge on her shoulder in the crowded bus.
meanings.sent3: The nudge from the puppy made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The nudge of the waves against the boat was soothing.
meanings.sent5: He gave a friendly nudge to his teammate during the game.

meanings.sent1: The teacher was nudging the students to participate in the discussion.
meanings.sent2: Her parents were nudging her to apply for the scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The idea of going for ice cream was nudging at her thoughts.
meanings.sent4: His curiosity was nudging him to explore the mysterious cave.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies was nudging her towards the kitchen.
